name: Evil Shogun (itch)
description:
Evil Shogun® is our first iOS mobile game, and now on macOS! 

The fictitious story is set during the Japanese Shogunate period, when the Shogun had strong power over the Emperor. Along with the far east oriental story, we have created several types of puzzles for the players to solve. Complementing all of this, is our lovingly hand crafted artwork, using traditional watercolours.

If you don't like the main puzzles, you can enable skipping past them from the settings menu!
